story.title: What is Habistat?
story.content: Habistat is a daily streak habit uptime tracker calendar designed to help you build and maintain consistent habits. It provides visual tracking and statistics to help you stay motivated and achieve your goals.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to help you build better habits through visual tracking, streak counting, and simple daily check-ins. We believe that consistency is the key to personal growth and success.

team.title: Features
team.content: Habistat includes habit tracking, streak counting, visual calendars, progress statistics, and customizable habit settings to help you maintain consistency in your daily routines.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about using Habistat?

start.title: Get Started with Habistat
start.subtitle: Start tracking your habits in three simple steps

step1.title: Create a Habit
step1.description: Define the habits you want to track and their frequency

step2.title: Daily Check-ins
step2.description: Mark your habits as complete each day to build your streak

step3.title: Track Progress
step3.description: Monitor your consistency and celebrate your achievements
